snippet.title: Shoot & Destroy X - Trailer 2024
snippet.description:
Shoot & Destroy X is an extended edition celebrating this 1-bit shoot'em up's 10th anniversary. 

An outer space menace is at large destroying and conquering the galaxy. 
It's up to you, the lone aircraft pilot, to fly up there and put an end to it.

3 Levels, 3 Power-Ups, 3 Bosses - 20+ minutes each playthrough. 
Includes a save system to save your high score and 3 achievements per level.

Available for Windows at Itch.io: 
https://samuelsousa.itch.io/

#Retro #Shooter #IndieGame
